    CHOCOLATE CAKE

    • 325g flour
    • 100g cocoa
    • 20g baking powder
    • 200g sugar
    • Â½ tsp. of salt
    • 500ml vegetable milk
    • 1 tsp. of vanilla extract
    • 60ml vegetable oil of neutral taste

    Mix all dry ingredients; Mix the dry and wet ingredients in an electric mixer; Cook for 45min in a 175Â°C temperature.

    Tooping ingredients:

    • 150g of dark chocolate
    • 100ml of vegetable milk
    • 75g of icing sugar
    • Â½ tsp. of vanilla extract

    Melt the chocolate in a double boiler; Mix all the other ingredients; Wait a few minutes and then cover the whole cake; Eat the delicious cake!

    CHOCOLATE MOUSSE

    • 175g of dark chocolate
    • 150g of aquafaba

    Melt the chocolate in a double boiler; Beat the aquafaba with an electric mixer until it becomes whisked aquafaba (â€œsnow whiteâ€ texture); Mix them both well; Put in the refrigerator for at least a few hours (between 4h and 48h, your pick); Eat the delicious mousse!
